Motto: Ua mau ke ea o ka ʻāina i ka pono
Translation: The life of the land is perpetuated in righteousness.

Motto: Our liberties we prize and our rights we will maintain

Translation: Let us be grateful to God

Motto: Ense petit placidam sub libertate quietem
Translation: By the sword we seek peace, but peace only under liberty
If you seek a pleasant peninsula, look about you
Let the welfare of the people be the supreme law
To be, rather than to seem
One sows for the benefit of another age

Motto: With God, all things are possible

Translation: She flies with her own wings

Motto:
Dum spiro spero 
Animis opibusque parati
Translation:
While I breathe, I hope 
Ready in soul and resource
May the fourteenth star shine bright
